title: Head covering
description: brown, maroon and yellow; central maroon square with center smaller brown diamond and four medallions; border design motifs of maroon circles and yellow lines, zigzags and diamonds; two sides decorated:  gold braid, orange band with multicolored leaf-shaped sequins and multicolored thread tufts on one side--orange band and multicolored thread tufts on opposite side
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
